data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: This summer, I will be helping with a play at the town theater. Many ____ my ____ are ____, ____ they ____ me ____ help ____ the ____. I ____ certainly ____ an ____! But I am going to help with the lights and sound.
data.partBlankContent: This summer, I will be helping with a play at the town theater. Many o_ my fri____ are act___, a__ they inv____ me t_ help wi__ the pl__. I a_ certainly n__ an ac___! But I am going to help with the lights and sound.
data.fullContent: This summer, I will be helping with a play at the town theater. Many of my friends are actors, and they invited me to help with the play. I am certainly not an actor! But I am going to help with the lights and sound.
data.answer: 今年夏天，我将在镇剧院帮忙演一出戏。我的很多朋友都是演员，他们邀请我帮忙演这部戏。我当然不是演员!但我要帮忙处理灯光和声音。
